title: Soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['440g plain flour', '135g cake flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '340g butter, softened', '250g caster sugar', '275g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '340g plain chocolate chips', '110g chopped walnuts (optional)']
